dict.acceptation: 绘画；油画；上色，着色；颜料，油漆；
绘画（ paint的现在分词）；涂色于；

sent.orig: WuBin s paintings include: Buddhism figure painting, landscape painting, flower-and-bird painting, genre painting and so on.
sent.trans: 吴彬作品主要包括：佛教人物画、山水画、花鸟画以及风俗画几个方面，其中以佛教人物画和山水画最为精彩。

sent.orig: We have painting, painting and-bird painting.
sent.trans: 有山水画、人物画和花鸟画。

sent.orig: Porcelain painting is a kind of painting jiust painting or decoration in Porelain.
sent.trans: 瓷画是指描绘装饰在陶瓷上的一种绘画。

sent.orig: China crafts: Pyrograph, Silk painting, Cloudy grass painting, Root carving, Oil painting.
sent.trans: 主营产品或服务：中国工艺画：烙画，彩帛画，云草画，根雕，油画。

sent.orig: We HAs earthscape painting, figure painting and flower and-bird painting.
sent.trans: 咱们有山水画、人物画和花鸟画。
